name: Learn CSS Grid
description: A powerful tool that allows for two-dimensional layouts to be created on the web and was created as a resource to help developers better understand and learn Grid.

name: CSS Grid generator
description: A way for people to use CSS Grid features quickly to create dynamic layouts.

name: CSS Tricks
description: This website shows how to use CSS elegantly and efficiently.

name: CSS Reference
description: Learn by example: this website is a free visual guide to CSS. It features the most popular properties, and explains them with illustrated and animated examples.

name: Grid by Example
description: This site is a collection of examples, video and other information to help you learn CSS Grid Layout.

name: How to Center in CSS
description: This website consolidates ways to center in CSS and generates the code for each situation.

description: This website consolidates ways to center in CSS and generates the code for each situation.
